data.title: Data
data.description: The GeoJSON data, represented as a binary blob, object literal, or a Promise for one of those things.If this property is set, CatalogItem's url is ignored.

dataSourceUrl.title: Data source URL
dataSourceUrl.description: The URL from which the GeoJsonCatalogItem's data was obtained.  This will be usedto resolve any resources linked in the GeoJSON file, if any.
